title: Stock market news live updates: S&P 500, Nasdaq drop for second straight day after Fed officials discuss half-point rate hike - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: S&P 500, Nasdaq drop for second straight day after Fed officials discuss half-point rate hike  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks advanced Thursday as investors continued to monitor a steady stream of corporate earnings results against a backdrop of elevated inflation and further Fed policy tightening.
